attributes.action: Leave the European union by the 22nd of May without a deal.
attributes.additional_details: 22nd of May allows for further preparation for no deal scenario. We must now leave without a deal and make good on the referendum result.
attributes.background: No deal is better than a bad deal. This has been repeatedly stated by our prime minister. The referendum stated leave or remain. Government leaflets stated leaving all aspects of the European union. Article 50 stated a time limit then no deal if no prior arrangements had been agreed.
